thread.title: Piers opens fire on JK Rowling: 'I've never read more badly-written nonsense'
thread.title_full: Piers opens fire on JK Rowling: 'I've never read more badly-written nonsense'

author: Telegraph Video
title: Piers opens fire on JK Rowling: 'I've never read more badly-written nonsense'
text:
Piers opens fire on JK Rowling: 'I've never read more badly-written nonsense' Watch | Piers opens fire on JK Rowling: 'I've never read more badly-written nonsense' 00:52 Telegraph Video , video source Good Morning Britain/ITN  07am 
P iers Morgan reignites his war of words with Harry Potter writer J K Rowling saying that he'd never read "more badly-written nonsense in my life".
